channel.title: OBS Forums
channel.description: Discussion forums for OBS Studio, the free and open source software for video recording and live streaming.

item.title: OBS Recordings freezing after 80 minutes or so, audio still records.
item.author: invalid@example.com (oceansea)
item.dc:creator: oceansea
item.content:encoded:
I recently began using OBS to record videos via my webcam. Before the recent update, they usually recorded the full 70 - 180 minute durations of what I was trying to record. Sometimes it would stop recording sooner than desired, but eventually that seemed to stop malfunctioning and recordings were recording the full durations until i selected to stop recordings and save them.

But now the most recent times Ive recorded via my webcam, obs records video and audio fine but only for an hour or...

Read more

item.title: My stream randomly stops streaming
item.author: invalid@example.com (kirbo)
item.dc:creator: kirbo
item.content:encoded: I just started getting back into streaming today and everytime i stream it stops streaming after awhile. I just want to know what to do i used 2 different internet sources and it keeps stopping. there is no crashing in the crash logs, it doesnt say anything on youtube or OBS, and i just want to know what to do...

item.title: OBS getting audio, but I can't monitor with headphones
item.author: invalid@example.com (darctur)
item.dc:creator: darctur
item.content:encoded:
I have OBS Studio 29.1.3 on Windows 11 with an MSI gaming desktop. I have video-only feeds from 2 PTZ Optics 20x cameras via a Blackmagic Decklink Duo 2 SDI capture card, which seems to work fine. One video+audio source comes into the SDI capture card from a laptop (HDMI output converted to SDI for the capture card). I have audio from various mics coming from a Yamaha TF1 mixer via M-Audio M-Track Solo to convert the mixer analog output to USB input for the PC. That works fine in OBS. But I...

item.title: how to cancel or change the output timer once started?
item.author: invalid@example.com (chitot)
item.dc:creator: chitot
item.content:encoded:
Tools->Output timer:

Hi, I mistakenly set the output timer to 1 hour instead of 2 hours to record something. After hitting "start", it seems there is no way to change or cancel the timer without stopping the already running recording session. It would be nice if I can actually cancel or change the timer without stopping first so that the recording is not split. Thanks.

item.title: Workstation Shutting Down
item.author: invalid@example.com (lateapex)
item.dc:creator: lateapex
item.content:encoded:
I've been using OBS for a while (recording only) with no problems. A few weeks ago I upgraded to Windows 11. Now, after 3-5 minutes of recording, my workstation turns off! I have a dual monitor and am recording the second monitor. If I start OBS with a blank screen, no problem. When I display a source, the computer will shutdown after 3-5 minutes. This is true even if I am NOT recording. or there is no video on the second screen (just a static screen).

I've upgraded the graphics...

Read more

item.title: Black Screen with PS3 and BlackMagic Intensity Pro 4K
item.author: invalid@example.com (guillaumesoucy)
item.dc:creator: guillaumesoucy
item.content:encoded:
Hello,
I’m trying to hookup my old PS3 to my BlackMagic Intensity Pro 4K using HDMI but it only showing a black screen or a green screen with vertical lines.
Initially, I hook the PS3 to a HDMI switch, seeing it wasn’t working, I plugged the PS3 directly to the BM card using the HDMI input, unfortunately it did not changes anything.
I read on this forums that it could be a HDCP issue. Is HDCP is enables on the whole PS3? With my XBox One the HDCP is only blacking specific apps such as...

item.title: Looking for recommendations for IP Camera Streaming
item.author: invalid@example.com (bassnetz)
item.dc:creator: bassnetz
item.content:encoded:
Hi everyone,
Newbie here and a noob at OBS Studio as well. :(
I am seeking for some recommendations to fix a couple of problems that we have while streaming with OBS.
Firstly, we use IP Cameras (not sure which build) that are wide-angled because the ceiling is not so high. So the video always looks stretched out (attachment 1). Is there any way this can be fixed on the output end?

Secondly, sometimes there is a burned patch appearing on the video if some objects move across (attachment...

item.title: Windows Remote Desktop Microphone not recognized
item.author: invalid@example.com (betagoo)
item.dc:creator: betagoo
item.content:encoded:
I connect from my computer (win10) to another computer (win11) by Windows Remote Desktop.
Remote audio recording into connection window is enable.
All settings to share remote audio into gpedit.msc are configured.
I can use voice typing into remote computer.
Recording sound from microphone works fine on remote computer (microphone is on local computer).
But.......
OBS Studio not recognize microphone.
Microphone volume metter not change colors, is still grayed.
I spend few hours to resolve...

item.title: Darkle
item.author: invalid@example.com (Dezintuit)
item.dc:creator: Dezintuit
item.content:encoded:
Dezintuit submitted a new resource:

Darkle - Dark + Purple = Darkle, a fork of the main Dark theme

A darker and slightly purple fork of the main dark theme. I used this as the base because of the smaller fonts, allowing for more content to be displayed at once.

Disclaimer: I made this for myself mainly, in a single afternoon. I don't know QSS, I just did search and replace and used the color picker to find the right colors.

That said, feel free to take it and change...
Click to expand...

Read more

item.title: Isn't there a Text To Speech plugin for real-time text?
item.author: invalid@example.com (oo22339)
item.dc:creator: oo22339
item.content:encoded:
I am currently using Closed Captioning via Google Speech Recognition 0.0.8.
This plug-in converts my voice into text in real time.
This text is entered as an OBS source and disappears after a while.
I want to convert this real-time text into AI voice and send it to the broadcast using this text source.
Is there a TTS plugin for this?
I searched, but I only see TTS plugins for donations or chatting.
Any help please?

item.title: Bug visual obs pc
item.author: invalid@example.com (The kebab king)
item.dc:creator: The kebab king
item.content:encoded: hello I'm new here but that's not the subject, it's already been more than a month since my obs had image bugs like grain or I don't really know what, I tested EVERYTHING, the optimization on youtube, use chat gpt, go and check the quality of my game and still these bugs whereas before on a less powerful PC that still everything works well. My fixed pc config: graphics card: geforce gt 1030, intel core i3 16gb ram.

item.title: New to OBS, Want to screen capture without logging into an account
item.author: invalid@example.com (RickyO)
item.dc:creator: RickyO
item.content:encoded: Since I'm new, not even sure I'm posting in correct area; apologies if in wrong area, and let me know where I should be posting with beginner's questions. Thanks. I'm learning as I go, starting with screen capture and then planning on streaming at some point thereafter. I was hoping OBS would allow me to simply screen capture without registering an acvount. Is that possible? If so, how??
